w:r.w:t: <div id="modal-cita" class="fixed inset-0 z-[100] hidden bg-black/80 backdrop-blur-sm flex items-center justify-center p-6">
<div class="card-premium w-full max-w-sm p-8 bg-[#0a0a0c] border-indigo-500/30 max-h-[90vh] overflow-y-auto">
<label class="text-[10px] uppercase font-bold text-gray-400 mb-1 block">Nombre del Cliente</label>
<input type="text" id="input-nombre" class="w-full bg-white/5 border border-white/10 rounded-xl px-4 py-3 outline-none focus:border-indigo-500 transition" placeholder="Ej. Juan Pérez">
<label class="text-[10px] uppercase font-bold text-gray-400 mb-1 block">Teléfono</label>
<input type="tel" id="input-telefono" class="w-full bg-white/5 border border-white/10 rounded-xl px-4 py-3 outline-none focus:border-indigo-500 transition" placeholder="Ej. 51234567">
<label class="text-[10px] uppercase font-bold text-gray-400 mb-1 block">Servicio</label>
<select id="input-servicio" class="w-full bg-white/5 border border-white/10 rounded-xl px-4 py-3 outline-none focus:border-indigo-500 transition">
<label class="text-[10px] uppercase font-bold text-gray-400 mb-1 block">Hora</label>
<input type="time" id="input-hora" class="w-full bg-white/5 border border-white/10 rounded-xl px-4 py-3 outline-none focus:border-indigo-500 transition">
<label class="text-[10px] uppercase font-bold text-gray-400 mb-1 block">Período</label>
<select id="input-periodo" class="w-full bg-white/5 border border-white/10 rounded-xl px-4 py-3 outline-none focus:border-indigo-500 transition">
<button onclick="closeModal()" class="flex-1 py-3 text-sm font-bold text-gray-400">Cancelar</button>
<button onclick="saveNewAppointment()" id="btn-save" class="flex-1 py-3 bg-indigo-600 rounded-xl text-sm font-bold">Guardar</button>

<button onclick="openModal()" class="fixed bottom-24 right-6 z-[60] w-16 h-16 bg-indigo-600 text-white rounded-full flex items-center justify-center shadow-lg border-4 border-[#0a0a0c] active:scale-95 transition">

<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="28" height="28" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="3" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"><path d="M12 5v14M5 12h14"/></svg>
<header class="fixed top-0 w-full z-50 nav-blur border-b border-white/5">

<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2"><path d="M22 11.08V12a10 10 0 1 1-5.93-9.14"/><polyline points="22 4 12 14.01 9 11.01"/></svg>
<div class="w-20 h-20 rounded-2xl border-2 border-indigo-500 p-1 relative wolf-avatar">
YADIER
Cloud Sync ON
<h3 class="text-lg font-bold mb-4 flex items-center gap-2">

<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="#6366f1" stroke-width="2"><rect x="2" y="4" width="20" height="16" rx="2"/><path d="M7 15h0M2 9.5h20"/></svg>
01
$200
02
$300
<div class="card-premium p-4 flex justify-between items-center border-indigo-500/20">
$500
<h3 class="text-lg font-bold mb-4 flex items-center gap-2">

<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="#059669" stroke-width="2"><rect x="1" y="4" width="22" height="16" rx="2" ry="2"></rect><line x1="1" y1="10" x2="23" y2="10"></line></svg>
<div class="w-12 h-12 bg-white/10 rounded-2xl flex items-center justify-center">
Banco Popular de Ahorro
<button onclick="payViaTransfermovil()" class="w-full py-4 btn-transfermovil rounded-2xl flex items-center justify-center gap-3 active:scale-95 transition">
<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="18" height="18" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2.5"><path d="M5 12h14M12 5l7 7-7 7"/></svg>

Al tocar, se abrirá la llamada para iniciar la transferencia.
Tarjeta BPA: 9212129970955961
<div class="card-premium p-4 border-indigo-500/20 flex justify-between items-center bg-indigo-500/5">
Cargando...
<div class="w-16 h-16 bg-white/5 rounded-full flex items-center justify-center mx-auto mb-4">

<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="#6366f1" stroke-width="2"><path d="M20 21v-2a4 4 0 0 0-4-4H8a4 4 0 0 0-4 4v2"></path><circle cx="12" cy="7" r="4"></circle></svg>
<nav class="fixed bottom-0 w-full nav-blur border-t border-white/5 px-10 py-5 z-50">

<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2.5"><rect x="3" y="4" width="18" height="18" rx="2" ry="2"></rect><line x1="16" y1="2" x2="16" y2="6"></line><line x1="8" y1="2" x2="8" y2="6"></line><line x1="3" y1="10" x2="21" y2="10"></line></svg>
<button class="text-gray-500 flex flex-col items-center gap-1 opacity-50">

<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2.5"><path d="M23 19a2 2 0 0 1-2 2H3a2 2 0 0 1-2-2V8a2 2 0 0 1 2-2h4l2-3h6l2 3h4a2 2 0 0 1 2 2z"></path><circle cx="12" cy="13" r="4"></circle></svg>
<button class="text-gray-500 flex flex-col items-center gap-1 opacity-50">

<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2.5"><path d="M20 21v-2a4 4 0 0 0-4-4H8a4 4 0 0 0-4 4v2"></path><circle cx="12" cy="7" r="4"></circle></svg>
import { getAuth, signInAnonymously, onAuthStateChanged, signInWithCustomToken } from "https://www.gstatic.com/firebasejs/11.6.1/firebase-auth.js";
import { getFirestore, collection, addDoc, onSnapshot, deleteDoc, doc, query, serverTimestamp } from "https://www.gstatic.com/firebasejs/11.6.1/firebase-firestore.js";
// Función de pago directo por Transfermóvil
// Carga de citas desde la nube
card.className = "card-premium p-5 flex items-center justify-between border-l-4 border-indigo-500 fade-in";

${cita.telefono ? `

${cita.telefono}

` : ''}
<button onclick="deleteCita('${cita.id}')" class="w-10 h-10 rounded-2xl bg-red-500/10 flex items-center justify-center text-red-500 border border-red-500/20 active:scale-90 transition">

<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="18" height="18" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2"><path d="M3 6h18"/><path d="M19 6v14a2 2 0 0 1-2 2H7a2 2 0 0 1-2-2V6"/><path d="M8 6V4a2 2 0 0 1 2-2h4a2 2 0 0 1 2 2v2"/></svg>
